gurmukhi: crn nhI iDAwie hY ] duSt giq pwie hY ]34]
transliteration: Charan Nahi Dhiaae Hai|| Dousht Gad(i) Paae Hai||34||
translation: They will not meditate on the feet of the lord and only the tyrants will be hailed .34.
All of them will go to hell and untimately repent.35.

gurmukhi: Drm kh Koihgy ] pwp kr roihgy ]36]
transliteration: Dharam Kah Khohege|| Paap Kar Rohege||36||
translation: All of them will ultimately repent on losing dharma.36.

gurmukhi: nrk pun bws hY ] qRws jm qRws hY ]37]
transliteration: Narak Poun Baas Hai|| Traas Jam Traas Hai||37
translation: They will abide in hell and the messengers of Yama will frighten them.37.

gurmukhi: ADrm krm kY hY ] n BUl nwm lY hY ] iksU n dwn dyh gy su swD lUt lyh gy ]38]
transliteration: Adharam Karam Kai Hai|| Na Bhool Naam Lai Hai|| Kisoo Na Daan Keh Ge|| Su Saadh Loot Leh Ge||38||
translation: Performing wicked deeds, the people will not even by mistake remember the name of the Lord; they will not give alms, but otherwise will loot the saints.38.

gurmukhi: n dyh Pyr lY kY ] n dyh dwn kY kY ] hir nwm kO n lY hY ] bysK nrk jY hY ]39]
transliteration: Na Deh Pher Lai Kai|| Na Deh Daan Kai Kai|| Har(i) Naam Kau Na Lai Hai|| Basekh Narak Jai Hai||39||
translation: They will not return the borrowed debt-money and will even give the promised amount in charity; they will not remember the Name of the Lord and such persons will specially be sent to hell.39.

gurmukhi: n Drm TwF rih hY ] krY n jaun kih hY ] n pRIq mwq sMgw ] ADIn ArDMgw ]40]
transliteration: Na Dharma Thaadh Rab(i) Bai|| Darai Na Jaoun Kab(i) Bai|| Na Prit Maat Sanad|| Adbeen Ardhanad||40||
translation: They will not remain stable in their religion and will not do in accordance with their utterance; they will have no affection for their mother and the people will become subservient to their wives.40.

gurmukhi: AB`C B`C B`CY ] Ak`C kwC k`CY ] ABwK bYx BwKYN ] iksU n kwx rwKYN ]41]
transliteration: Abhachchh Bhachchh Bhachchhai|| Akachchh Kaadhh Kachchhai|| Abhaakh Bain Bhaakhain|| Kisoo Na Kaan Raakhain||41||
translation: The uneatable will be eaten and people will visit the unworthy places; the people will utter the unutterable words and will not care for anybody.41.

gurmukhi: ADrm krm kir hY ] n qwq mwq fir hY ] kumMqR mMqR kY hY ] su mMqR kO n lY hY ]42]
transliteration: Adharam Karam Kar(i) Hai|| Na Taat Maat Dar(i) Hai|| Koumantra Mantra Kai Hai|| Su Mantra Kau Na Lai Hai||42||
translation: They will peroform unrighteous acts and will not have any advice and will not seek good advice.42.

gurmukhi: ADrm krm kY hY ] su Brm Drm KuAY hY ] su kwl PwNs Ps hY ] indwn nrk bis hY ]43]
transliteration: Adharam Karam Kai(i) Hai|| Su Bharam Dharma Khuai Hai|| Su Kaal Phaans Phas Hai|| Nidaan Narak Bas(i) Hai||43||
translation: They will perform acts of unrighteousness and will lose their dharma in illusions; thy will be entrapped in the noose of Yama and untimately reside in hell.43.

gurmukhi: kukrm krm lwgy ] suDrm Cwf Bwgy ] kmwq in`q pwpM ] ibswr srb jwpM ]44]
transliteration: Koukaram Karam Laage|| Sudharam Chhaad Bhaage|| Kamaat Nitt Paapan|| Bisaar Sarah Jaapan||44||
translation: The people being engrossed in misconduct will abandon disciplines and engross themselves in sinful actions.44.

gurmukhi: su m`d moh m`qy ] su krm ky kup`qy ] su kwm kRoD rwcy ] auqwr lwj nwcy ]45]
transliteration: Su Madd Moh Matte|| Su Karam Ke Koupatte|| Su Kaam Krodh Raache|| Outaar Laaj Naache||45||
translation: The people intoxicated with wine and attachment will perform uncivilised acts and being absorbed in lust and anger, they will dance unashamedly.45.
